title: Drawing, "End Table", early 20th century
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: 6; in red color pencil at lower right: P; in graphite at lower right; 7697 [circled]
description: Perspective drawing of small end table in upper right. Right side of table is green lacquer (?) or glass in demi-lune shape. Three shelves on right side; top shelf opens and extends toward the left to create a circular surface area. Left side of table in wood (?) with one demi-lune shelf at middle of table.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "End Table", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1309.
